concept.title: Preparing the Software and Setup Utilities

p.i: NOTE TO REVIEWERS: Software and setup utilities to be defined.

section.p: The software and setup utilities are distributed in the installation package on the DVD. You have to mount the DVD and execute the setup.sh script that is provided. It extracts the utilities required for installing .
After extraction, the following files and directories are available:

li.p: Docker files for the CMM components. ##
##version number?## monasca-agent-2.3.0.run. Executable for running the Metrics Agent installer on an OpenStack node.
##version number?## log-agent-2.4.1_0.5.3.run. Executable for running the Log Agent installer on an OpenStack node.
##version number?## monasca-ui-1.10.0.run. Executable for running the Horizon Plugin installer on the node where the OpenStack Horizon service is installed.
